articles.title: What's Wrong With Suryakumar Yadav? Sunil Gavaskar's 'Nothing' Reply - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Suryukumar Yadav was dismissed for three first-ball ducks in the ODI series against Australia, leaving many in the Indian cricketing fraternity bewildered.
articles.content: The name 'Suryakumar Yadav' is on every fan's mind after the talismanic batter secured three successive first-ball ducks in the ODI series against Australia. For the first couple of games, left-arm p… [+1741 chars]
